member.name: T:MyMath.Operations
member.summary: Provides mathematical operations related to integer calculations.

member.name: M:MyMath.Operations.Add(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Adds two integers and returns the result.
member.returns: The sum of the two integers.

member.name: M:MyMath.Operations.Subtract(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Subtracts the second integer from the first and returns the result.
member.returns: The difference between the two integers.

member.name: M:MyMath.Operations.Multiply(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Multiplies two integers and returns the result.
member.returns: The product of the two integers.

member.name: M:MyMath.Operations.Divide(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Divides the first integer by the second and returns the result.
member.param: The numerator (the integer to be divided).
The denominator (the integer to divide by).
member.returns: The quotient of the two integers.
member.exception: Thrown when the denominator (b) is zero.
